https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7TJjCR3ajoFV7TjMOCrqy98xPoJ.jpg A 21-year-old university student lost her boyfriend in a sudden accident and she can't get over him, but she begins to change thanks to her family and her friend Takumi, who shares a very similar past with her. Before a Falling Star Fades Away
